dcterms:creator: J.R. Hershey
Z. Chen
J. Le Roux
S. Watanabe
dcterms:description: The WSJ0-2mix dataset consists of two-speaker mixtures generated from the WSJ0 corpus, containing 30 hours of training data and 10 hours of validation data, with a test set of 5 hours. The mixtures are created by randomly selecting from a pool of 49 male and 51 female speakers, with Signal-to-Noise Ratios (SNRs) uniformly chosen between 0 dB and 5 dB.
dcterms:title: WSJ0-2mix

dcterms:creator: J. Garofolo
D. Graff
D. Paul
D. Pallett
dcterms:description: The WSJ0 corpus is a collection of speech data used for training and evaluating speech recognition systems. It includes a variety of speakers and is widely used in the field of speech processing.
dcterms:title: WSJ0 corpus
